meaningMnemonic: If you're <radical>stand</radical>ing under a <radical>tree</radical> and you <radical>see</radical> your <kanji>parent</kanji>, it's a good chance for a moment of <kanji>intimacy</kanji>.
readingMnemonic: Standing under the tree, you go to give your <kanji>parent</kanji> a big hug, but you manage to bang your <reading>shin</reading> (しん)  on a huge tree root. Your parent pulls you in for a warm hug and rubs your shin. Despite the pain, it becomes an unforgettable "shin-timate" moment.
